channel.title: What type of mobile OS do you use?
channel.description: I know I am making another thread but I'm a curious person. What type of phone do you use? iPhone, iPad, iPod, Andriod, or Others?

item.title: What type of mobile OS do you use?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

My devices:
Samsung Showcase: Currently running a custom port of MIUI (android) 2.3.2, originally made for Samsung Fascinate (more difference than it looks)
Asus Transformer eeepad: Currently running Recolver4 (a custom version of the stock android 4.0 rom).
HTC Hero CDMA: Currently running Cyanogenmod7, later to run a custom android 4.0 rom.

I am an android junkie lol.

Read full topic
